H0.text: In the novel 'Treasure Island' name the pirate shot dead by Jim Hawkins in the rigging of the Hispaniola. Long John Silver

H1.text: In the novel 'Treasure Island' name the pirate shot dead by Jim Hawkins in the rigging of the Hispaniola. Billy Bones

H2.text: In the novel 'Treasure Island' name the pirate shot dead by Jim Hawkins in the rigging of the Hispaniola. Black Dog

H3.text: In the novel 'Treasure Island' name the pirate shot dead by Jim Hawkins in the rigging of the Hispaniola. Israel Hands

A4.text: Hands engages in a prolonged battle with Jim Hawkins before being shot by the boy.
